description: An Astronomical Image Fidelity Assessment Tool

parameters.info: Residual image to extract the statistical distribution of residual flux
parameters.name: residual-image

parameters.info: Model caltalog (lsm.html/text) file to extract peak source flux
parameters.name: tigger-model

parameters.info: Restored image to extract the dynamic range
parameters.name: restored-image

parameters.info: Factor to multiply the psf size to get peak source area (tot_area = psf-size*af)
parameters.name: area-factor

parameters.info: Name of the point spread function file or psf size in arcsec
parameters.name: psf

parameters.info: Name of model to use for normality testing.
parameters.name: normality-test

parameters.info: Label
parameters.name: label

parameters.info: Data range to perform normality testing
parameters.name: data-range

parameters.info: Field of view width to querry online catalog in degrees e.g. '1.0d'
parameters.name: width

parameters.info: Source catalog (text/lsm.html) files to compare
parameters.name: compare-models

parameters.info: List of restored image (fits) files to compare. Note that this will initially run a source finder.
parameters.name: compare-images

parameters.info: List of catalog models files to compare with online catalog
parameters.name: compare-online

parameters.info: Residual (fits) files to compare. e.g: ['res1.fits', 'res2.fits']
parameters.name: compare-residuals

parameters.info: Data points to randomly sample the residual/noise image
parameters.name: data-points

parameters.info: Tolerance to cross-match sources in arcsec
parameters.name: tolerance

parameters.info: Number of decimal places to round off results
parameters.name: decimals

parameters.info: Type of plot for flux comparison of the two catalogs
parameters.name: flux-plot

parameters.info: Get stats of channels with pixel flux above thresh in Jy/Beam
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.info: Get stats of specified channels e.g. '10~20;100~1000'
parameters.name: channels

parameters.info: Name of the mask image fits file
parameters.name: mask-image

parameters.info: Prefix of output html files
parameters.name: html-prefix

parameters.info: Prefix of output catalog file name
parameters.name: online-catalog-name

parameters.info: Online catalog to compare local image/model.
parameters.name: online-catalog

parameters.info: Centre of online catalog to compare local image/model in 'RA hh:mm:ss, Dec deg:min:sec'
parameters.name: centre_coord

parameters.info: Factor to multiply the field of view for random points. i.e. 0.0-1.0'
parameters.name: fov-factor

parameters.info: Use the closest source only when cross matching sources
parameters.name: closest

parameters.info: Compare all sources irrespective of shape, otherwise only point-like sources are compared
parameters.name: all-source

parameters.info: Cross-match only sources with a maj-axis equal or less than this value
parameters.name: shape-limit

parameters.info: Plot only cross-matched sources with distance from the phase centre less than this value in degrees
parameters.name: only-off-axis

parameters.info: Units to represent the results
parameters.name: units

parameters.info: Source finder to run if comparing restored images
parameters.name: source-finder

parameters.info: Source finder parameter file
parameters.name: config

parameters.info: List of noise-like (fits) files to compare
parameters.name: compare-residual-subimages

parameters.info: List of subimage centre pixels and their sizes to compute stats. e.g. ['256,256,100']
parameters.name: centre-pixels-size

parameters.info: Input aimfast fidelity results file (JSON format) to get plots
parameters.name: fidelity-results

parameters.info: Name of output file name
parameters.name: outfile
